iyal_quality_analyzer.inference_base package

Submodules

iyal_quality_analyzer.inference_base.inference module

class iyal_quality_analyzer.inference_base.inference.Inference(cache_dir=None, model_name='sanujen/Tamil_Legacy_Roman_Classifier_V2', model_version='version_1')[source]

Bases: object

A class used to perform inference using a pre-trained BERT model for sequence classification.

cache_dir

Directory to cache the model. Default to absolute path of this file directory + models + {model_version}

Type:

str

model_name

Name of the pre-trained model on huggingface.co. Default to “sanujen/fyp_0”.

Type:

str

model_version

Version of the model. Default to “version_0”.

Type:

str

label_mapping

Mapping of label indices to label names.

Type:

dict

pipe

Pipeline for text classification.

Type:

transformers.pipelines.Pipeline

tokenizer

Tokenizer for the pre-trained model.

Type:

transformers.AutoTokenizer

model

Pre-trained BERT model for sequence classification.

Type:

transformers.BertForSequenceClassification

device

Device to run the model on (CPU or GPU).

Type:

torch.device

inference(word)[source]

Performs inference on the given word and returns the predicted label.

inference(word)[source]

Performs inference on the given word and returns the predicted label.

Parameters:

word (str) – The input word to classify.

Returns:

The predicted label for the input word.

Return type:

str

iyal_quality_analyzer.inference_base.inference_coll_to_stand module

class iyal_quality_analyzer.inference_base.inference_coll_to_stand.Inference(cache_dir=None, model_name='sanujen/mBART_Tamil_Colloquial_to_Standard', model_version='version_1')[source]

Bases: object

A class used to perform inference using a pre-trained mBART model for colloquial to standard Tamil translation.

cache_dir

Directory to cache the model. Default to absolute path of this file directory + models + {model_version}

Type:

str

model_name

Name of the pre-trained model on huggingface.co. Default to “sanujen/mBART_Tamil_Colloquial_to_Standard”.

Type:

str

model_version

Version of the model. Default to “version_1”.

Type:

str

pipe

Pipeline for text translation.

Type:

transformers.pipelines.Pipeline

device

Device to run the model on (CPU or GPU).

Type:

torch.device

inference(sentence)[source]

Performs inference on the given sentence and returns the translated sentence.

inference(sentence)[source]
